title: Online Coach Development Training Design: Blended Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of fundamental coaching concepts and practical experience (less than one year)
context.additional_context: Intensive online coaching development workshop for in-service professionals, integrating personal device utilization and offline sessions

learning_goals: Learners can apply the four-stage online learning design process: (1) learner analysis, (2) instructional method selection, (3) technology tool selection, and (4) content development.
Learners can design coaching educational materials and develop assessment tools in blended learning environments.
Learners can plan effective online learning activities in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
